WRITING.TEXT: Deine Sorgen mchte ich haben... Hast du wirklich so viel Zeit auf deinen Hnden, dass du du Youtube-Thumbnails miteinander vergleichst?
Technically it does include them, but they already reload "correctly" in normal mode.
No spotting, no minimap, friendly fire, no auto-healing at all (only a medic can heal you). If you reload while there are still bullets in the magazine, these are lost.
What cultural differences do you mean? Forgive the ignorance, but I sincerely can't imagine that many between you two.
What exactly did you mean to improve?
